description:
Kogoro, Conan, and Ran visit a park with a lake connect to the sea where the scenery changes according to the ebb and flow of the tide. When the tide flows out, Conan spots a body on the flood bridge. The body belongs to Kimishima Ryuji, the second president of a food manufacturing company. Marks on his neck indicate that he was strangled, and Kogoro investigates the case both as a murder and an accident. Park groundskeeper Tanba claims he didn`t see a body when the tide was out in the morning. Chiba prefectural police officer Motoi questions Ryuji`s wife Aoi and his brother Yuta. Both Aoi and Yuta seem to suspect each other...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La renversante affaire du parc à marrées
